changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `clients` ( `ID` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , `NOM` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , `PRENOM` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , `EMAIL` VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL , `TELEPHONE` INT(10) NULL DEFAULT NULL, `ADRESSE` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `CODEPOSTAL` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `VILLE` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `FONCTION` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , `SOCIETE` VARCHAR(50) NULL DEFAULT NULL , PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) USING BTREE, UNIQUE INDEX `unique_email_idx` (`EMAIL`) USING BTREE ) COLLATE='utf8_general_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB ;
